Title: New Arrival
Subtitle: In Which our Protaganist Becomes Acquainted with the Denizens of a Sleepy Town

Steps.Description: Speak to Pisces in her copper spire.

Title: Halls of Gray
Subtitle: In which our Protaganist Seeks Out Adventure in a Perilous Dungeon Known as Halls of Gray

Steps.Description: Travel due west from [todo: think of name for starting town] until you find Halls of Gray.
Slay the beast which roams the premises.
